'''Radiant Spincrystal 92''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]].<!--to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].-->

It is located on a platform inside the ruins at [[Safhe Shatranj]], once the player has progressed through [[The Dirge of Bilqis]] [[World Quest]].
